creator.description:
A community-powered verification labeler, offering labels and badges based on collectively-verified trust. 

Learn more about us at https://trustcollective.org

locales.description: Account connected to a government, a government office, or a politician.
locales.name: 🏛 Government

locales.description: 🛡️​ (Moderation) This account is believed to be a bot maliciously posting machine generated or disruptive content.
locales.name: ​🤖​ Bot

locales.description: 🛡️​ (Moderation) This account is believed to be posting abusive, harassing, bullying, or other dangerous content.
locales.name: ​⚠️ Abusive

locales.description: 🛡️​ (Moderation) This account is believed to be posting misleading content.
locales.name: ​⚠️​ Misleading

locales.description: Official account(s) of the organization linked in the profile.
locales.name: ​🏢​ Organization

locales.description: Account verified to be a contributor to a recognized podcast.
locales.name: 🎙️​ Podcaster

locales.description: Account verified to be a writer, editor, or owner of a recognized blog.
locales.name: Blogger

locales.description: Account verified to be an independent or freelance journalist.
locales.name: 📓​ Independent Journalist

locales.description: Account verified to be a journalist working on a recognized international media platform
locales.name: 📰 Journalist

locales.description: Account verified to be a Canadian journalist from a recognized Canadian journalism platform.
locales.name: 🇨🇦📰 Journalist

locales.description: Account verified to be connected to the business linked in the profile.
locales.name: Business

locales.description: This account is associated with the government of Canada, one of its provinces, or local governments.
locales.name: 🇨🇦 🏛 Government

locales.description: 🛡️​ (Moderation) This account is believed to be spam due to the content of their posts and community reports.
locales.name: Spam or spamming activities

locales.description: This account has been verified to be the official account of the blog linked in the account's profile.
locales.name: Blog

locales.description: This person has been verified to be associated with an accredited or recognized research institution or college or university.
locales.name: 🎓 Academic
